Achievement.Title: Got All Dragon Items
Achievement.Description: You got all of the dragon items.

Achievement.Title: Killer Bat: Max One Class
Achievement.Description: You achieved the highest rank for one class of the Killer Bat Shadow.

Achievement.Title: Saber-Tooth: Max One Class
Achievement.Description: You achieved the highest rank for one class of the Saber-Tooth Shadow.

Achievement.Title: Equipped All Mechat Parts
Achievement.Description: You got all of the mechat part types and completed all enhancements.

Achievement.Title: Mechat Shooting Stage 2: Perfect
Achievement.Description: You destroyed all the mechat base machine guns in Mechat Shooting Stage 2.

Achievement.Title: Got to Nene Before Bomb Went Off
Achievement.Description: You arrived at Nene's location before the time bomb went off.

Achievement.Title: Pulled in the Flying Fortress
Achievement.Description: You helped pull in the Flying Fortress without angering the Gorgo giants.

Achievement.Title: Closed Flying Fortress Door
Achievement.Description: You closed the Flying Fortress door without fighting the mecha robos.
